overview: Dr. Michal Zaremba is Chief Research Officer of seekda GmbH. He holds a Ph.D. degree in industrial engineering at the National University of Ireland and M.Sc. degree in computer science and management at the Wroclaw University of Technology in Poland. He has been involved in several research projects at the European level (SOA4ALL, Sembiz, SUPER, DIP, Knowledge Web, SWWS, Moment and Smartisan) focusing on various aspects related to semantics and Web Services. Michal has been a contributor to the WSMO and WSMX working groups; chair of OASIS Semantic Execution Environment Technical Committee (SEE TC) and co-chair of Conceptual Models for Services Working Group (CMS WG). In 2007 he co-founded seekda OG - transformed in 2009 to seekda GmbH - focusing currently on the development of SaaS application called seekda! connect and intended for the e-tourism sector.
